subject: Automobile Racing
Economic Conditions and Trends
Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Martinsville, Va., a town that built its economy around the motorsports industry, is shifting its focus to adapt to the economic downturn.
snippet: Martinsville, Va., a town that built its economy around the motorsports industry, is shifting its focus to adapt to the economic downturn.
